mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dashboard_security_project( companyCode, companyName, projectLevel, projectName, projectFunds, recordedFunds, recordedFundsRate, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{companyCode}, #{companyName}, #{projectLevel}, #{projectName}, #{projectFunds}, #{recordedFunds}, #{recordedFundsRate}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dashboard_security_project SET projectLevel=#{projectLevel}, projectName=#{projectName}, projectFunds=#{projectFunds}, recordedFunds=#{recordedFunds}, recordedFundsRate=#{recordedFundsRate}, updateTime=#{updateTime}
